title: The least frequent daily users of social media
summary: This chart shows the Minutes of at the from Age 15-24 to 55-64 .
\\n From the chart we see that the Minutes of were 150 , at their highest in 45-54 .
\\n The Minutes slowly declined over the next 3 - 4 Age to 74 in 35-44 .
gold: The graph shows the least frequent daily users of social media . According to the graph , the least frequent users I gather to be the 35 - 44 age group at approx . 70 minutes spent on social media ( graph is n't clear what the minutes are ) , followed by 25 - 34 also around 70 minutes .
